steps.description: Heat-Heat 3 tbsp oil in a pan over medium heat
steps.modified_description: Heat-Heat 4 tbsp oil in a pan over medium heat

errors.description: Heating 4tbsps of oil instead of 3 tbsps

steps.description: Add-Add 1/4 tsp mustard to the pan

errors.description: Spill out while scooping and adding mustard seeds to the pan

steps.description: Add-1/2 tsp cumin seeds to the pan
add-When mustard and cumin seeds begin to sizzle, add minced garlic
Chop-Chop tomato roughly (anysize chunks are fine)
Take-Take the pan off the heat
puree-puree tomatoes without any water in a blender/mixer

errors.description: Did not puree the tomatoes, instead left them as chunks

steps.description: mix-mix well contents of the pan
Add-1/2 tsp salt to the pan

errors.description: Adding more salt to the pan instead of 1/2 tsp as there is no scooping and measuring

steps.description: Add-Add tomato puree to the pan
simmer-Allow the mixture to simmer over low heat for 5 minutes or until the mixture becomes thick
Mix-Mix well tomato puree with contents in the pan
Transfer-Transfer it to a serving bowl
Add-Add 2 tbsp red chili powder to the pan

errors.description: Did not add red chilli powder to the pan
